readers:
    my_app: # service name
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        routepath: /debug/vars
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 500ms
        timeout: 3s
        backoff: 10
recorders:
    elastic1: # service name
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: expipe
        timeout: 8s
        backoff: 10
routes:
    route1:
        readers:
            - my_app
        recorders:
            - elastic1
